title: How much will it cost to develop a physical product? - Quora

response.answer_text: For a small wood product?   A couple hundred to a couple thousand dollars. For a military fighter jet?   Several hundred billion, perhaps even over a trillion.

From almost nothing to millions.....If it is a small simple thing, and you are alone doing it during the weekend with salvaged parts from another project, almost nothing. If your design team and your engineering team, in collaboration with your software devellopers, are working in your design center, probably millions.
